summary: Email correspondence between Lloyd Epstein and US Attorney's Office (USANYS) regarding a request to adjourn a case involving an individual named Guerrero, citing the client's recovery from a bad traffic accident.

persons.name: Lloyd Epstein
persons.context: Attorney requesting an adjournment for a case involving his client Guerrero, citing the client's recovery from a traffic accident.

persons.name: Guerrero
persons.context: Individual who is the subject of a case requiring adjournment due to recovery from a bad traffic accident.

connections.description: Lloyd Epstein is representing Guerrero in a legal case and is requesting an adjournment on his behalf.

events.title: Adjournment Request for Guerrero Case
events.description: Lloyd Epstein requests an adjournment of a case involving his client Guerrero, citing Guerrero's recovery from a bad traffic accident.

keyFacts: Lloyd Epstein, an attorney, requested an adjournment for a case involving his client Guerrero.
The adjournment was requested because Guerrero was still recovering from a bad traffic accident.
The request was made via email to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) on September 15, 2016.
The correspondence shows a routine legal procedural matter unrelated to the main Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficking case.
